entry_requirements_raw.Degree:
Applicants should have completed A Bachelor’s degree in related fields with a minimum CGPA of 2.50 as accepted by the Academic Senate; OR A Bachelor’s degree in related fields with a minimum of CGPA of 2.00 as accepted by the Academic Senate, subject to further internal assessment; OR A Bachelor’s degree with a minimum of CGPA of 2.00 as accepted by the Academic Senate, subject to further internal assessment; OR.  Note:
An applicant with a non-cognate Bachelor’s degree with a minimum CGPA of 2.00 and without relevant working experience are required to complete all fundamental units.
An applicant who has a non-cognate qualification and who has relevant working experience will be assessed to determine completion of all fundamental units.
An applicant with a cognate qualification may be determined as having completed all fundamental units.
